title: Late 19th century social and gender roles

content.question: In the late nineteenth century, the ideals of family life and gender roles reflected in the two images underwent which of the following transformations?

choices.label: The ideals were largely superseded by socialist notions of collective child rearing.
The ideals were increasingly adopted by working-class families.
The ideals were modified to accommodate the fact that most women had become part of the paid workforce.
The ideals were rejected by nationalists as incompatible with authentic folk culture.

content.answer: The ideals were increasingly adopted by working-class families.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
